import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import'./Navbar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const[isScrolled,setIsScrolled]=useState(false);const[isMobileMenuOpen,setIsMobileMenuOpen]=useState(false);const navigate=useNavigate();const location=useLocation();useEffect(()=>{const handleScroll=()=>{setIsScrolled(window.scrollY>20);};window.addEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);return()=>window.removeEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);},[]);const toggleMobileMenu=()=>{setIsMobileMenuOpen(!isMobileMenuOpen);};const handleNavigation=target=>{setIsMobileMenuOpen(false);if(target==='programs'){// Navigate to separate Programs page
navigate('/programs');}else if(target==='home'){// Navigate to home page
navigate('/');}else{// For other sections, check if we're on home page
if(location.pathname==='/'){// If on home page, scroll to section immediately
setTimeout(()=>{scrollToSection(target);},50);}else{// If on other page, navigate to home with state to scroll after navigation
navigate('/',{state:{scrollTo:target}});}}};const scrollToSection=sectionId=>{const element=document.getElementById(sectionId);if(element){element.scrollIntoView({behavior:'smooth'});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navbar ".concat(isScrolled?'scrolled':''),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav-logo",onClick:()=>handleNavigation('home'),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"logo-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/images/oxford-logo.svg",alt:"Oxford Logo",className:"logo-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"logo-text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"logo-main",children:"OXFORD"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"logo-sub",children:"Fashion Institute"})]})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-links ".concat(isMobileMenuOpen?'mobile-open':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#home",onClick:e=>{e.preventDefault();handleNavigation('home');},children:"Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#about",onClick:e=>{e.preventDefault();handleNavigation('about');},children:"About Us"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/programs",onClick:e=>{e.preventDefault();handleNavigation('programs');},children:"Programs"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#verification",onClick:e=>{e.preventDefault();handleNavigation('verification');},children:"Verification"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#gallery",onClick:e=>{e.preventDefault();handleNavigation('gallery');},children:"Showcase"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#contact",onClick:e=>{e.preventDefault();handleNavigation('contact');},children:"Contact Us"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mobile-menu-toggle",onClick:toggleMobileMenu,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{})]})]})})});};export default Navbar;
